original_title: The Stalker Chronicles: Episode Four - Connection
overview: For Samantha, a friendly exchange in an Internet chat room soon turns into an uneasy meeting when she confronts 'loverboy' for real. The barrier of the computer screen is broken with tragic consequences.
tagline: Internet chatrooms can be dangerous, you should be mindful of what you confide.
title: The Stalker Chronicles: Episode Four - Connection
